LON.description: longitude, check/ask two conventions in imma1 doc

VI.description: visibility indic. ICOADS.C0.VI not found in new set

SI.description: SST measurement method, table not like original, nor like in doc

BSI.description: box system indicator. Currently not in use

TR.description: duration of period of reference for amount of precipitation

QI1.description: QC indicator for height of clouds

QI10.description: QC indicator for sea surface temperature

QI11.description: QC indicator for period of wind waves of of measured waves

QI12.description: QC indicator for height of wind waves of of measured waves

QI15.description: QC indicator for characteristic of pressure tendency

QI16.description: QC indicator for amount of pressure tendency

QI17.description: QC indicator for true direction of ship

QI18.description: QC indicator for ship's average speed

SLL.description: max height of cargo above summer load line

SLHH.description: departure of summer max load line from sea level

QI23.description: QC indicator for course over ground

QI24.description: QC indicator for speed over ground

QI28.description: QC indicator for relative wind direction

QI29.description: QC indicator for relative wind speed

OPCV.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide value

OPCZ.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide depth

InstAbbr.description: Abbreviation of the Institute where the original data is stored

InsName.description: Name of the Institute where the original data is stored

InsPlace.description: Place of the Institute where the original data is stored

InsLand.description: Country of the Institute where the original data is stored

No_data_entry.description: Administrative number under which the data is found within the Institute

NameArchiveSet.description: Administrative name under which the data is found within the Institute

ArchivePart.description: Part of the archive set in which the data is found

Specification.description: Specification of the part of the archive set in which the data is found

Logbook_id.description: Identification of the logbook that holds the underlying data

Image_No.description: Identification Number of the original image

LatInd.description: Latitude indicator, explains what was the origin of the given final decimal latitude.

LonInd.description: Longitude indicator, explains what was the origin of the given final decimal longitude.

ZeroMeridian.description: Meridian that is used as the reference for the ships' longitude

LMname1.description: Name of first landmark of which a bearing was recorded

LMname2.description: Name of second landmark of which a bearing was recorded

LMname3.description: Name of third landmark of which a bearing was recorded

PosCoastal.description: If position is considered to be coastal

logbook_date.description: Date of the observation from logbook

TimeOB.description: Time on board of the observation from logbook at noon 12 hrs

Watch.description: Watch, name of the period of 4 hours which is known as a watch or duty on board ships

Glasses.description: Number of glasses within a watch; one watch equals 8 glasses

Start_day.description: Start time of the ships' day

Ship_type.description: Type of ship; e.g. schooner, barque, frigate

Company.description: Company which owns or manages the ship

Rank1.description: Full rank of the principal observer

Rank2.description: Full rank of the second observer

Rank3.description: Full rank of the third observer

voyage_from.description: Place or country where the ship departed from

voyage_to.description: Place or country where the ship sailed to

AnchorPlace.description: Place or country where the ship anchor or moored

VoyageIni.description: Initial date of the start of the voyage of this ship. Format is year-month-day (YYYYMMDD) and is extracted from the logbooks date (i.e. it is not corrected to UTC)

Course_ship.description: Course made good; course of the ship during the past 24 hours

Ship_speed.description: Ships' speed; average speed of the ship during the previous 24 hours

Distance.description: Distance travelled during the previous 24 hours

EncName.description: Name of ship that was encountered

EncNat.description: Nationality of ship that was encountered

AT_reading_units.description: Air Therm Reading Units. Units of the (outside) air thermometer reading

SST_reading_units.description: Sea surface temperature reading units. Units of the sea surface thermometer reading

AP_reading_units.description: Air Pressure Reading Units. Units of the reading of the air pressure

BART_reading_units.description: Barometer Temperature Reading Units. Units of the reading of the attached thermometer

ReferenceCourse.description: Reference that is used for the ships' course (e.g. true north or magnetic north)

ReferenceWindDirection.description: Reference that is used for the wind direction (e.g. true north or magnetic north)

Distance_units.description: Units of distances, other than the following two fields

Distance_units_travelled.description: Units of distances travelled by the ship

units_of_measurement.description: Units of other values that may be used (e.g. current speed units)

humidity_units.description: Units of the reading of the humidity instrument

water_at_pump_units.description: Units of the amount of water reported at the pump

wind_scale.description: Name of, or reference to the wind scale that has been used

SST.description: Reading of the sea surface thermometer

wind_dir.description: All wind directions. All reported wind directions on this day; the wind direction is the direction that points to where the wind comes from.

current_dir.description: Direction of the current; This direction points to where the current is flowing towards to.

current_speed.description: Speed of the current. PENDING KEY TABLE

pump_water.description: Amount of water reported at the pump.

wind_force.description: All reported wind forces on this day.

Thunder.description: 1 If thunder and or lightning was reported.

Sea_ice.description: 1 If sea-ice or icebergs were reported.

Trivial_correction.description: If a trivial correction was made in this observation.

Release.description: Number of the CLIWOC release in which the current record appeared first. If corrections/modifications were made to the observation, the release number was increased to the current version.
